level.heading: Single custodianship.
level.text: A transfer shall be made only for 1 minor, and only 1 person may be the custodian. All custodial property held under this chapter by the same custodian for the benefit of the same minor constitutes a single custodianship.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-87
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-87, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-301.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 10 of the Uniform Transfers to Minors Act.
